languages.text: "Паскаль, неужели ты не желаешь покопаться в этом существе? Узнать слабые места ереси?"
"Pasqal, don't you want to see what this creature is made of and learn about any weaknesses that we could use in the fight against heresy?"
languages.original_text: "Паскаль, неужели ты не желаешь покопаться в этом существе? Узнать слабые места ереси?"

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, don't you want to see what this creature is made of and learn about any weaknesses that we could use in the fight against heresy?"
"Pasqal, don't you want to see what this creature is made of and learn about any weaknesses that we could use in the fight against heresy?"
"Pasqal, don't you want to see what this creature is made of and learn about any weaknesses that we could use in the fight against heresy?"
"Pasqal, don't you want to see what this creature is made of and learn about any weaknesses that we could use in the fight against heresy?"
"Pasqal, don't you want to see what this creature is made of and learn about any weaknesses that we could use in the fight against heresy?"

languages.text: 「パスカル、この生物が何でできているかを観察し、異端に対して使えるかもしれない弱点を知りたくはないのか？」
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, don't you want to see what this creature is made of and learn about any weaknesses that we could use in the fight against heresy?"

traits.locale_text: 「パスカル、この生物が何でできているかを観察し、異端に対して使えるかもしれない弱点を知りたくはないのか？」

languages.text: « Pasqal, ne voulez-vous pas étudier le fonctionnement de cette créature ? Si nous trouvions ses faiblesses, nous pourrions en tirer parti pour lutter contre l'hérésie. »
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, don't you want to see what this creature is made of and learn about any weaknesses that we could use in the fight against heresy?"

traits.locale_text: « Pasqal, ne voulez-vous pas étudier le fonctionnement de cette créature ? Si nous trouvions ses faiblesses, nous pourrions en tirer parti pour lutter contre l'hérésie. »

languages.text: “帕斯卡，难道你不想看看这个怪物的结构吗？如果你能了解它的弱点，说不定可以帮助我们对抗异端分子。”
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, don't you want to see what this creature is made of and learn about any weaknesses that we could use in the fight against heresy?"

traits.locale_text: “帕斯卡，难道你不想看看这个怪物的结构吗？如果你能了解它的弱点，说不定可以帮助我们对抗异端分子。”

languages.text: «Pasqal, ¿no le gustaría ver de qué está hecha esa criatura y descubrir alguna debilidad que podamos usar contra los herejes?».
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, don't you want to see what this creature is made of and learn about any weaknesses that we could use in the fight against heresy?"

traits.locale_text: «Pasqal, ¿no le gustaría ver de qué está hecha esa criatura y descubrir alguna debilidad que podamos usar contra los herejes?».

languages.text: "Pasqal, wollt Ihr denn nicht sehen, woraus diese Kreatur besteht? Um zu lernen, welche Schwächen sie hat, die wir uns im Kampf gegen die Ketzerei zunutze machen können?"
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, don't you want to see what this creature is made of and learn about any weaknesses that we could use in the fight against heresy?"

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, wollt Ihr denn nicht sehen, woraus diese Kreatur besteht? Um zu lernen, welche Schwächen sie hat, die wir uns im Kampf gegen die Ketzerei zunutze machen können?"

languages.text: "Pasqal, yaratığın neden yapıldığını öğrenmek ve zaaflarını keşfetmek istemiyor musun? Sapkınlığa karşı mücadelemizde elimize güçlü bir koz geçmesin mi?"
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, don't you want to see what this creature is made of and learn about any weaknesses that we could use in the fight against heresy?"

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, yaratığın neden yapıldığını öğrenmek ve zaaflarını keşfetmek istemiyor musun? Sapkınlığa karşı mücadelemizde elimize güçlü bir koz geçmesin mi?"
